meanings.definition: wanderoos (noun): a type of monkey native to South Asia
meanings.sent1: The zoo had a new exhibit featuring playful wanderoos.
meanings.sent2: I read a book about the different species of wanderoos found in South Asia.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous wanderoos stole all the bananas from the picnic.
meanings.sent4: In the dense jungle, the wanderoos swung gracefully from tree to tree.
meanings.sent5: The colorful fur of the wanderoos made them stand out among the other monkeys.

meanings.definition: wanderoos (verb): to wander aimlessly or roam around without a specific destination
meanings.sent1: After getting lost in the forest, we had to wanderoos for hours before finding our way back.
meanings.sent2: On weekends, I enjoy taking my dog for a walk and wanderoos around the park.
meanings.sent3: The children decided to wanderoos through the neighborhood, exploring every corner.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the travelers began to wanderoos through the ancient ruins, captivated by the history.
meanings.sent5: Lost in thought, she would often wanderoos through the streets, oblivious to her surroundings.
